scenarios.scenario_name: Test for products with invalid category_id
scenarios.description: This test scenario is designed to validate that all products have a valid category_id. The test will fail if there are any products with a category_id that does not exist in the categories table.
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[products] WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[categories] WHERE [dbo].[products].[category_id] = [dbo].[categories].[id])) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

scenarios.description: This test scenario is designed to validate that all products have a category_id. The test will fail if there are any products without a category_id.
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[products] WHERE category_id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
